00020 class FrmFuncSynth;
00021 
00022 class XFuncSynth : public XPrimaryDriver
00023 {
00024     XNODE_OBJECT
00025 protected:
00026     XFuncSynth(const char *name, bool runtime,
00027                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00028                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00029                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00030                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00031 public:
00032     //! usually nothing to do
00033     virtual ~XFuncSynth() {}
00034     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00035     virtual void showForms();
00036 protected:
00037     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00038     virtual void start();
00039     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00040     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00041     virtual void stop();
00042   
00043     //! this is called when raw is written 
00044     //! unless dependency is broken
00045     //! convert raw to record
00046     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00047     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00048     //! record is readLocked
00049     virtual void visualize();
00050   
00051     //! driver specific part below
00052     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &output() const {return m_output;}
00053     const shared_ptr<XNode> &trig() const {return m_trig;} //!< trigger to burst
00054     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &mode() const {return m_mode;}
00055     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &function() const {return m_function;}
00056     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &freq() const {return m_freq;} //!< [Hz]
00057     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &amp() const {return m_amp;} //!< [Vp-p]
00058     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &phase() const {return m_phase;} //!< [deg.]
00059     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &offset() const {return m_offset;} //!< [V]
00060 protected:
00061     virtual void onOutputChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00062     virtual void onTrigTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &) = 0;
00063     virtual void onModeChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00064     virtual void onFunctionChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00065     virtual void onFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00066     virtual void onAmpChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00067     virtual void onPhaseChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00068     virtual void onOffsetChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) = 0;
00069 private:
00070     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode>  m_output;
00071     const shared_ptr<XNode>  m_trig;
00072     const shared_ptr<XComboNode>  m_mode;
00073     const shared_ptr<XComboNode>  m_function;
00074     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_freq;
00075     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_amp;
00076     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_phase;
00077     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode>  m_offset;
00078     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOutput, m_lsnMode, m_lsnFunction,
00079         m_lsnFreq, m_lsnAmp, m_lsnPhase, m_lsnOffset;
00080     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnTrig;
00081     xqcon_ptr m_conOutput, m_conTrig, m_conMode, m_conFunction,
00082         m_conFreq, m_conAmp, m_conPhase, m_conOffset;
00083 
00084     const qshared_ptr<FrmFuncSynth> m_form;
00085 };
